metadata.description: Deadpool is one of the best mercenaries on the planet. He may even be a passable Avenger—jury's still out. But one thing's for sure—Deadpool is a terrible team leader. Think we're lying? Ask the Mercs for Money! Deadpool's taken on a new high-paying mission to take out radioactive super villains...and his Mercs aren't nearly as immune to radiation as his healing-factored heinie is. Deadpool veteran Cullen Bunn brings us mo' mercs, mo' money and naturally, mo' problems.
metadata.name: Deadpool & The Mercs For Money
